      "title": "Insecure Direct Object Reference",

      "recommendation": "Implement proper authorization checks to ensure that the user has permission to access the requested resource. Validate that the user associated with the JWT is the same as the one being retrieved."

      "title": "JWT Validation Weakness",
      "severity": "HIGH",
      "cwe_id": "CWE-347",
      "description": "The application relies on the JWT for authentication but does not appear to validate the signature or expiration of the token, which could allow an attacker to forge a token.",
      "line_numbers": [12],
      "recommendation": "Ensure that the JWT is properly validated, including checking the signature and expiration time. Use a secure library for JWT handling that enforces these checks."
    },
    {
      "title": "Potential Information Disclosure",
      "severity": "MEDIUM",
      "cwe_id": "CWE-200",
      "description": "Debug information is logged to the output, which may expose sensitive information about the claims and the application structure.",
      "line_numbers": [20],
      "recommendation": "Remove or secure debug logging in production environments to prevent sensitive information from being exposed."
    }
